If you keep losing your connection with our servers, it might not be an issue with the game itself but more of an unstable connection. Sometimes your home internet can be in tip top shape but still have issues talking with specific servers. 

Let's run through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make your that your network can get a stable connection with our servers.
